metadata.name: First of Many
metadata.description: In celebration of our 300th space, we're excited to announce the launch of a new token. This token will serve as the key to unlocking many future drops and rewards. We've been working hard to reach this milestone and are thrilled to be able to share it with our community. The launch of this token not only marks a significant achievement for us, but it also opens up new possibilities for our community to engage and participate. We look forward to the future and the many exciting developments to come.
